statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (4,-15) and (11,-4).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{-{4}-{\left(-{15}\right)}}}{{{11}-{\left({4}\right)}}}=\frac{{11}}{{7}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{11}}{{7}} (if it's not already reduced)
